title: Your Order on U7 Jewelry
content: <p><span style="font-family: 微软雅黑, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;; font-size: 14px;">Hello,&nbsp;dear&nbsp;friend,&nbsp;</span></p><p><span style="font-family: 微软雅黑, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;; font-size: 14px;"><br/></span></p><p><span style="font-family: 微软雅黑, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;; font-size: 14px;">This is Elsa, your Personal manager at U7 Jewelry :)</span><span style="font-family: 微软雅黑, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;; font-size: 14px;">Thanks for your visite on </span><a href="https://www.u7jewelry.com/" target="_self"><span style="font-family: 微软雅黑, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;; font-size: 14px;">https://www.u7jewelry.com/</span></a><span style="font-family: 微软雅黑, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;; font-size: 14px;"> </span><span style="font-family: 微软雅黑, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;; font-size: 14px;">.&nbsp;</span></p><p><span style="font-family: 微软雅黑, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;; font-size: 14px;"><br/></span></p><p><span style="font-family: 微软雅黑, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;; font-size: 14px;">Your shopping cart is waiting for your return :)&nbsp;</span><span style="font-family: 微软雅黑, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;; font-size: 14px;">If&nbsp;there&nbsp;is&nbsp;no&nbsp;problem,&nbsp;we&nbsp;kindly&nbsp;suggest&nbsp;you&nbsp;to&nbsp;make&nbsp;payment&nbsp;ASAP.&nbsp;So&nbsp;that&nbsp;we&nbsp;can&nbsp;send&nbsp;it&nbsp;for&nbsp;you&nbsp;soon.</span></p><p><span style="font-family: 微软雅黑, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;; font-size: 14px;"><br/></span></p><p><span style="font-family: 微软雅黑, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;; font-size: 14px;">Best&nbsp;regards<br/>Elsa Young | U7 Jewelry</span></p>
